Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2010 01:23PM SandysDaughter wrote: My mom was diagnosed with bone mets in 2003.  She was fairly stable until about a year ago. The past few months have been faster progression. Liver lesions discovered in January. This last scan shows bone mets all over vs. where they had pretty much stayed all these years. It's been 7 years for my mom.  She's been on disability since we found the bone mets in 2003.   Hope some of this helped. Andrea
Posts.Title: Stage IV-How long can we stay NED? ibcmets Lowrider54
